p: Certain adenovirus serotypes are associated with particular clinical features and severe illness; however, no study has offered persuasive evidence for in the different degrees of disease severity caused by HAdV-3 and HAdV-7 infection because it still limits on the basis of clinical observation. In the present study, therefore, we undertook a comprehensive analysis of the comparative clinical features of HAdV-3 and HAdV-7 infection, as well as a serial of experiments, were performed to better understand the association between severity of the disease and the serotypes of HAdVs.
